title: Molecular Biology Laboratory
description: Introduction to techniques used in molecular biology and biotechnology; DNA extraction, characterization, cloning, Southern blotting, reverse transcription, polymerase chain reaction, and sequencing analysis. 1 lecture, 2 laboratories. Crosslisted as BIO/CHEMÂ 475. Formerly BIO/CHEM 375.
prerequisites: BIO 161, and grade of C- or better in BIO 351 or CHEM 373 or consent of instructor
